title: Love Island Australia fans say Cartier Surjan, 19, is 'too young' for the show
text:
Love Island Australia fans have expressed their shock and concern after learning that contestant Cartier Surjan is just 19 years old.

Despite only being on the show for two days, the 'born-again Christian' has said she wants to 'find a husband' and has even prepared a list of baby names.

'Just a quick reminder that Cartier is nineteen years old and that is too young,' one viewer tweeted, after the brunette revealed she saw a future with Eoghan Murphy.

Too young for reality TV? Love Island Australia fans have expressed their shock and concern after learning that contestant Cartier Surjan (pictured) is just 19 years old

'Oh, [shut the f**k up], Cartier. Talking about baby names makes you sound like a bloody idiot,' another viewer wrote.

'Cartier is 19 and she's on Love Island to find a hubby?' asked a third Twitter user.

Questions about Cartier's age were raised on both Twitter and Instagram, with fans saying she needs more life experience before settling down.

Too son? Despite only being on the show for two days, 'born-again Christian' Cartier has said she wants to 'find a husband' and has even prepared a list of baby names

'You sound like a bloody idiot': Questions about Cartier's age were raised on both Twitter and Instagram, with fans saying she needs more life experience before settling down

On Tuesday night, Cartier confessed that Irish intruder Eoghan was 'amazing and gorgeous' and had left her feeling 'intrigued'.

They went on a brief date, but at the end of the episode Eoghan left Cartier upset when he chose to couple up with Jessie Wynter instead.

During their brief conversation, Cartier had asked Eoghan 'what type of man' he was.



Slow down! Cartier told Eoghan (left) during Tuesday's episode that she has 'got a list' of baby names prepared and wants to call her future daughter Saskia

'I know who I am and I've got the right values and morals,' he responded.

'I look at it this way, one day you'll likely have a daughter, and how would you want your daughter to be treated? Treat the girl you're with as you'd treat your daughter.'

As the pair began discussing children, Cartier became visibly enthusiastic.

'I've already got, like, names. I've got a list, and you have to choose from a list. I like the unusual [names]. For a girl, I like Saskia, that's on my list,' she said.
description: Love Island Australia fans have expressed their shock and concern after learning that contestant Cartier Surjan is just 19 years old.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
